Enterprise Barcode Scanner
Home Screen Next Skip Back Got It Manual entry use QR code
Welcome!
AeonLabs Cloud API barcode scanner allows anyone to scan a barcode or a QR code and send it to a cloud server API of your choice. Check AeonLabs API documentation on how to set up the API on your server.
Configure the Cloud API To begin, first, connect to your Cloud server API. Anonymous Data, Always!
As part of AeonLAbs free services, you allow anonymous barcode data and location to be sent to AeonLabs\'s Open Data access Database. This anonymized open data will help businesses and industries with anonymous data analytics.
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
Play Again
Type the Server web address without the final / Cloud Server API Url Are you sure you want to add Connect to a Cloud Server API where the barcodes will be sent. You need to type a valid url web address Connect to a Cloud Server API where the barcodes will be sent. You need a valid QR code with The cloud server API web address.
